1.longDescription: Establish a solid layer of fundamentals, learn what's under the hood of Angular 2

2.longDescription: Build Services using Observables, learn to use the HTTP module effectively.

angular2-hello-world-write-first-applica.description: Angular 2 Tutorial For Beginners - Build Your First App - Hello World Step By Step
angular2-hello-world-write-first-applica.longDescription: This is step by step guide to create your first Angular 2 application. Its aimed at beginners just starting out with the framework.This lesson will show how to create a component, and how to link the component to a given custom HTML tag. It will show how to give the component a given template.

angular2-build-your-first-component.description: Building Your First Angular 2 Component - Component Composition
angular2-build-your-first-component.longDescription: In this lesson we are going to see how to include a component inside another component. We are going to create a simple search box component and include it in our main application.
